explains: v. 组成，构成；是，被视为；成立，设立；任命
wordGroup: constitute a crime 构成犯罪；进行犯罪

sentences.en: China's ethnic minorities constitute less than 7 percent of its total population.
sentences.cn: 中国的少数民族构成总人口的不到7%。

sentences.en: Testing patients without their consent would constitute a professional and legal offence.
sentences.cn: 未得病人同意即对其进行试验会构成职业和法律犯罪。

sentences.en: Both of these lobes together constitute a pi bond.
sentences.cn: 上下两片叶一起组成了一根 π 键。
